name: Videogame Idea Generator
description:
This is a prototype for a game idea generator I'm thinking about.

Based on the reaction on this prototype, I will decide to create a standalone web application with an online database where people can submit game ideas and recieve all the submissions sent in by other users. In that way, you can still get scenarios you wouldn't think of beforehand. 

In the meantime, I will update the little game frequently with new keywords I added or you added in the discussion board below. That way you can get the newer versions with all the updated keywoards. 

If the game has good reactions though, I will add the online database ASAP so you wouldn't need to redownload the game constantly. 

Thanks in advance and feel free to leave some submissions in the discussion board below!

Press 'Esc' to quit the game. 'R' to restart the scene

Left Mouse button = generate idea.

Q/E toggle between idea titles.
